response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 スペシャル ザ ベスト
response.overview: It has been almost a year since the release of the first special edition of this popular series, in which we carefully select and introduce horror videos submitted to us. Over the past year, we have visited many places with various guests, and this time we have decided to release the best edition as the culmination of all of them. This time, we have decided to release the BEST edition as a compilation of our visits. It is filled with various contents such as live footage of haunted places, not to mention the standard video contributions.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video: Special - The Best
